messages.text:
Idea: include versions of packages touched in stacktraces

Perhaps appended to each line after the file path

Or just a summary 
`Used: julia v1.5.3, Foo v1.2.3, Bar v2.3.4`

It might make it easier to debug issues, especially from afar
